Verses: 1 theevugale, Enakku Munbaaga Mavunamaayirungal; Janangal Thangal Belanaip Pudhidhaakkikkondu, Sameebiththu Vandhu, Pinbu Pesakkadavargal; Naam Orumikka Nyaayaasanaththukku Munbaaga Seruvom.

2 kizhakkilirundhu Needhimaanai Ezhuppi, Thamadhu Paadhapadiyile Varavazhaiththavar Yaar? Jaadhigalai Avanukku Oppukkoduththu, Avanai Raajaakkalukku Aandavanaakki, Avargalai Avan Pattayaththukkuth Thoosiyum, Avan Villukku Sidharadikkappatta Thaaladiyumaakki,
3 avan Avargalaith Thuraththavum, Than Kaalgal Nadavaadhirundha Paadhaiyile Samaadhaanaththode Nadakkavum Panninavar Yaar?
4 adhai Seydhu Niraivetri, Aadhimudharkondu Thalaimuraigalai Varavazhaikkiravar Yaar? Mundhinavaraayirukkira Karththaraagiya Naandhaane; Pindhinavargalodum Iruppavaraagiya Naandhaane.
5 theevugal Adhaik Kandu Bayappadum, Boomiyin Kadaiyaandharangal Nadungum; Avargal Serndhuvandhu,
6 oruvarukku Oruvar Oththaasai Seydhu Thidankol Endru Sagodharanukku Sagodharan Sollugiraan.

7 siththiravelaikkaaran Thattaanaiyum, Suththiyaale Melliya Thagadu Thattugiravan Adaikallinmel Adikkiravanaiyum Urchaagappaduththi, Isaikkiradharkaana Pakkuvamendru Solli, Adhu Asaiyaadhapadikku Avan Aanigalaal Adhai Irukkugiraan.
8 en Dhaasanaagiya Isravele, Naan Therindhukonda Yaakkobe, En Snegidhanaana Aabiragaamin Sandhadhiye,
9 naan Boomiyin Kadaiyaandharangalilirundhu, Unnai Eduththu, Adhin Ellaigalilirundhu Azhaiththuvandhu: Nee En Dhaasan, Naan Unnaith Therindhukonden, Naan Unnai Veruththuvidavillai Endru Sonnen.
10 nee Bayappadaadhe, Naan Unnudane Irukkiren; Thigaiyaadhe, Naan Un Dhevan; Naan Unnai Balappaduththi Unakku Sagaayampannuven; En Needhiyin Valadhukaraththinaal Unnaith Thaanguven.
11 idho, Unmel Erichchalaayirukkira Yaavarum Vetki Lachchaiyadaivaargal; Unnode Vazhakkaadugiravargal Naasamaagi Ondrumillaamarpovaargal.
12 unnode Poraadinavargalaiththediyum Kaanaadhiruppaai; Unnode Yuththampannina Manushar Ondrumillaamal Ilporulaavaargal.
13 un Dhevanaayirukkira Karththaraagiya Naan Un Valadhukaiyaip Pidiththu: Bayappadaadhe, Naan Unakkuth Thunainirkiren Endru Sollugiren.
14 yaakkobu Ennum Poochchiye, Isravelin Sirukoottame, Bayappadaadhe; Naan Unakkuth Thunainirkiren Endru Karththarum Isravelin Parisuththarumaagiya Un Meetpar Uraikkiraar.
15 idho, Poradikkiradharku Naan Unnaip Pudhidhum Koormaiyumaana Parkalulla Yandharamaakkugiren; Nee Malaigalai Midhiththu Norukki, Kundrugalaip Padharukku Oppaakkividuvaai.

16 avaigalaith Thootruvaai, Appozhudhu Kaatru Avaigalaik Kondupoi, Suzhalkaatru Avaigalaip Parakkadikkum; Neeyo Karththarukkulle Kalikoorndhu, Isravelin Parisuththarukkulle Menmaipaaraattikkondiruppaai.

17 sirumaiyum Elimaiyumaanavargal Thanneeraith Thedi, Adhu Kidaiyaamal, Avargal Naavu Thaagaththaal Varalumpodhu, Karththaraagiya Naan Avargalukku Sevikoduththu, Isravelin Dhevanaagiya Naan Avargalaik Kaividaadhiruppen.
18 uyarndha Medugalil Aarugalaiyum, Pallaththaakkugalin Naduve Ootrugalaiyum Thirandhu, Vanaandharaththaith Thanneerth Thadaagamum, Varandaboomiyai Neerkkenigalumaakki

19 vanaandharaththile Kedhurumarangalaiyum, Seeththimmarangalaiyum, Mirudhuchchedigalaiyum, Olivamarangalaiyum Nattu, Avaandharaveliyile Dhevadhaaruvirutchangalaiyum, Paaimaravirutchangalaiyum, Punnaimarangalaiyum Undupannuven.
20 karththarudaiya Karam Adhaichcheydhadhu Endrum, Isravelin Parisuththar Adhaip Padaiththaar Endrum, Yaavarum Kandu Unarndhu Sindhiththu Arivaargal.
21 ungal Vazhakkaik Konduvaarungal Endru Karththar Sollugiraar; Ungal Balamaana Nyaayangalai Velippaduththungal Endru Yaakkobin Raajaa Uraikkiraar.

22 avargal Avaigalaik Konduvandhu, Sambavikkappogiravaigalai Namakkuth Therivikkattum; Avaigalil Mundhi Sambavippavaigal Innavaigalendru Solli, Naam Nammudaiya Manadhai Avaigalinmel Vaikkumpadikkum, Pindhi Sambavippavaigalaiyum Naam Ariyumpadikkum Namakkuth Therivikkattum; Varunkaariyangalai Namakku Arivikkattum.

23 pinvarum Kaariyangalai Engalukkuth Theriviyungal; Appozhudhu Neengal Dhevargal Endru Arivom; Alladhu Nanmaiyaavadhu Theemaiyaavadhu Seyyungal; Appozhudhu Naangal Thigaiththu Egamaaik Koodi Adhaippaarppom.
24 idho, Neengal Sooniyaththilum Sooniyamaayirukkireergal; Ungal Seyal Verumaiyilum Verumaiyaanadhu; Ungalaith Therindhukollugiravan Aruvaruppaanavan.

25 naan Vadakkeyirundhu Oruvanai Ezhumbappannuven, Avan Varuvaan; Sooriyodhaya Thisaiyilirundhu En Naamaththaith Thozhudhukolluvaan; Avan Vandhu Adhipadhigalai Setraippolavum, Kuyavan Kalimannai Midhippadhupolavum Midhippaan.

26 naam Adhai Ariyumpadiyaaga Aadhiyil Sonnavan Yaar? Naam Avanai Yadhaarththavaan Endru Sollumpadi Poorvakaalaththil Ariviththavan Yaar? Arivikkiravan Oruvanum Illaiye; Uraikkiravanum Illaiye; Ungal Vaarththaigalaik Kettirukkiravanum Illaiye.
27 mudhal Mudhal, Naane, Seeyonai Nokki: Idho, Avaigalaip Paarendru Solli Erusalemukku Suviseshagaraik Kodukkiren.
28 naan Paarththen, Avargalil Arivikkiravan Oruvanumillai; Naan Ketkun Kaariyaththukkup Pradhiyuththaram Kodukkaththakka Oru Aalosanaikkaaranum Avargalil Illai.
29 idho, Avargal Ellaarum Maayai, Avargal Kiriyaigal Virudhaa; Avargaludaiya Vikkiragangal Kaatrum Verumaiyundhaane.
